p: In total, 3672 patients diagnosed with CLL between 2007 and 2013 were identified from the Swedish Cancer registry for whom all (100%) medical files were available for review. Out of these, 1053 patients had started first-line treatment between 2007 and 2013, thus being subject to further in-depth analysis. The six geographical regions included 10â€“23% of the patients each. Sparsely populated areas included fewer patients (10%) than those with the larger cities. Median follow up for all patients was 4.8 years.
